events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit at all.
The customer's request has been categorized as a refund inquiry related to a return.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund and return case for the customer.
Hello! I'm Lisa. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund. How can I assist further?
Could you please confirm the order number and the reason for the return to process your refund quickly?
Sure, the order number is 789654123. The jacket is too large and doesn't fit well.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email. Once received, we will refund your money within 5 business days.
That sounds good. I appreciate the quick response and easy return process.
I've sent the prepaid shipping label to your email, so you can return the jacket at your convenience and receive your refund promptly.
Just checking in to ensure you received the prepaid label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and dropped the jacket off yesterday. Thank you for the support!
The refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Please reach out any time if you need help again.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email to get your feedback on your recent support experience.
